description:

description:
L2LPTDataCache.setL2LPTGateway(address) (contracts/L2/gateway/L2LPTDataCache.sol#37-39) should emit an event for: 
	- l2LPTGateway = _l2LPTGateway (contracts/L2/gateway/L2LPTDataCache.sol#38)

L2LPTDataCache.increaseL2SupplyFromL1(uint256) (contracts/L2/gateway/L2LPTDataCache.sol#46-50) should emit an event for: 
	- l2SupplyFromL1 += _amount (contracts/L2/gateway/L2LPTDataCache.sol#47)

L2LPTDataCache.decreaseL2SupplyFromL1(uint256) (contracts/L2/gateway/L2LPTDataCache.sol#57-69) should emit an event for: 
	- l2SupplyFromL1 = 0 (contracts/L2/gateway/L2LPTDataCache.sol#63) 
	- l2SupplyFromL1 -= _amount (contracts/L2/gateway/L2LPTDataCache.sol#65)

L1LPTGateway.setMinter(address)._minter (contracts/L1/gateway/L1LPTGateway.sol#63) lacks a zero-check on :
		- minter = _minter (contracts/L1/gateway/L1LPTGateway.sol#64)

L1Migrator.getMigrateUnbondingLocksParams(address,address,uint256[]) (contracts/L1/gateway/L1Migrator.sol#460-498) has external calls inside a loop: (amount) = bondingManager.getDelegatorUnbondingLock(_l1Addr,_unbondingLockIds[i]) (contracts/L1/gateway/L1Migrator.sol#473-476)
markdown: [L1Migrator.getMigrateUnbondingLocksParams(address,address,uint256[])](contracts/L1/gateway/L1Migrator.sol#L460-L498) has external calls inside a loop: [(amount) = bondingManager.getDelegatorUnbondingLock(_l1Addr,_unbondingLockIds[i])](contracts/L1/gateway/L1Migrator.sol#L473-L476)
